full_summary:
## Global Tender RFQ-EMI Filtering Faraday Enclosure Tent

### Summary
The [Government of Canada](http://www.canada.ca) is soliciting proposals to provide a Faraday Tent (RF-EMI Filtering Enclosure) designed to protect digital information from electromagnetic interference (EMI).

### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3613023483
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 25, 2022, 2:00 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time (PDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 24, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Reported Location:** [Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), 333 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario](http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/)

### Tender Specification
A Faraday Tent is required by the Canada Border Services Agency’s (CBSA) Digital Forensic Unit (DFU) for use in their Vancouver laboratory. The tender is open to all interested companies and will be awarded to the lowest bidder.

### Trade Agreements
This tender adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to bidders from Canada.

### Contact Information
Questions and proposals should be directed to:

**Costa, Michaela**
[Email](mailto:michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
**Afrex Canada**
[Website](http://www.pwgsc-ca.gc.ca)

### Procurement Method
This tender is open to all interested companies. Proposals are due by October 25, 2022, 2:00 p.m. PDT.

### Tender Status
This tender has expired.

### Expected Use
The Faraday Tent will be used to protect digital information contained within seized digital devices for forensic analysis purposes.

Please find further information on the official government website: [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14063842?extsite=MTQwNjM4NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
